title: Cameroon crackdown sparks talk of war
text:
Cameroon crackdown sparks talk of war Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:43 
Accounts of the military tactics used in trying to quell a growing secessionist movement to split Cameroon's English-speaking minority from Yaounde has shed new light on the fast-deteriorating security situation in the Anglophone part of the country. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Accounts of the military tactics used in trying to quell a growing secessionist movement to split Cameroon's English-speaking minority from Yaounde has shed new light on the fast-deteriorating security situation in the Anglophone part of the country.
